DocumentMetaData.shortTitle: Claim Settlements (Alberta and Saskatchewan) Implementation Act
DocumentMetaData.longTitle: An Act to facilitate the implementation of those provisions of first nations’ claim settlements in the Provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan that relate to the creation of reserves or the addition of land to existing reserves, and to make related amendments to the Manitoba Claim Settlements Implementation Act and the Saskatchewan Treaty Land Entitlement Act
DocumentMetaData.shortTitleHTML: Claim Settlements (Alberta and Saskatchewan) Implementation Act
DocumentMetaData.longTitleHTML: An Act to facilitate the implementation of those provisions of first nations’ claim settlements in the Provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan that relate to the creation of reserves or the addition of land to existing reserves, and to make related amendments to the Manitoba Claim Settlements Implementation Act and the Saskatchewan Treaty Land Entitlement Act
